alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 8:21PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Kit Carson County through 900 PM MDT... At 821 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Cope, or 15 miles north of Seibert, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Kit Carson County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
